nodes.text: Ytram was a pirate and a member of the Red Fury Brotherhood, a pirate gang active in the Cularin system before the Clone Wars.

Most of the pirates in the Brotherhood, including the leader, were fond of the annual Festival held in Tolea Biqua, which was near the pirate base in asteroid L-7. Commonly, the majority of the pirates enjoyed the party. In 31 BBY, Ytram and two other pirates, Triven and Naand were ordered to remain in L-7 during the Festival, as a skeleton crew, much to their chagrin.

During this watch, a team of raiders approached L-7, pretending to be messengers. Ytram tried to mock of them both through the communicator and once they had landed, because he was bored and wanted to improve the moral — mostly his moral.
